note:
Professional geek, amateur guitarist. Toots 92.7% cat. I have a pet dragon called Brian in my attic. He/him.

Profile picture is me and the lady known as Darling Wife, in a pub, both looking down at the camera.

Header is a small black cat with a fluffy white belly curled up on her side with her paws held at slightly odd angles so we can see her belly. Her eyes are open and seem to be looking at something towards the bottom of the image, which we can't see.
